components.name: tiqFpA
components.content: Welcome to the Day 1 Questionnaire for the H1N2 response. This questionnaire is for Contacts.

components.name: P1Q3
components.title: Interviewers Telephone Number
components.hint: If not a UK phone number, please add the country code

components.name: P1Q6
components.title: What is the Index Case ID

components.name: tiqGpA
components.content: Tell us if the respondent is the subject of this contact report.

components.name: P2Q3
components.title: What is the respondents relationship to the contact subject

components.name: P2Q6
components.title: Respondent Employment Position
components.hint: Only applicable for medical workers

components.name: P2Q7
components.title: Respondent Employment Organisation
components.hint: Only applicable for medical workers

components.name: P3Q2
components.title: Date of Death
components.hint: If the contact has died, please enter the date of death. If the precise day is not known, please enter 15th of the month

components.name: P3Q3
components.title: If the contact has died, was Influenza AH1N2 a contribution to Death

components.name: P3Q9
components.title: Date of Birth
components.hint: If the precise day is not known, please enter 15th of the month

components.name: P3Q22
components.title: Healthcare Worker with Direct Patient Care

components.name: P3Q23

components.name: P3Q25
components.title: Does the contact work with animals

components.name: P4Q4
components.title: Is the contact part of an institutional outbreak

components.name: P4Q6
components.title: In the last 10 days, did the contact attend a mass gathering
components.hint: e.g. a festival

components.name: P4Q8

components.content: For a healthcare worker, please tell us how many confirmed cases they are aware of which they have been in contact with in the healthcare setting (they will be asked about non-healthcare contacts later).
components.hint: Note: contacts may not be aware of the original index case which they are associated with, and this information should not be disclosed.

components.name: tiqGpA
components.content: Tell us if the contact has shown any symptoms.

components.name: P9Q1
components.title: Has the contact previously tested positive for Flu A H1N2?

components.name: P9Q2
components.title: If yes, date of positive test
components.hint: If the precise day is not known, please enter 15th of the month

components.name: P9Q3
components.title: Has the contact experienced any fever or respiratory symptoms in the 14 days before symptom onset or date of test in the index contact
components.hint: Reminder; please look back at the date for the index case and ask the contact about the 14 days before and after this date.

components.name: P9Q4
components.title: Has the contact experienced any fever or respiratory symptoms in the 14 days after symptom onset or date of test in the index contact
components.hint: Reminder; please look back at the date for the index case and ask the contact about the 14 days before and after this date.

components.name: P9Q5

components.content: When you proceed on to the next screen you will see a summary of all your responses with an option to submit your report. Before you press submit, press CTRL+P and Save to PDF to save a record of questionnaires and answers.
